title: Abstract Earth
story: After a tough climb, the air felt thin and cold. In my desperation to grasp oxygen, I laid on the flattest place available. After recuperating, I noticed an angle. Took the camera, and 'Click!'

title: Milky Way Over Brazilian Highlands
alt: Long exposure of the Milky Way stretching across a dark sky above silhouetted mountains
story: Waited for moonset to capture the core in all its glory.

title: Toco Toucan in Morning Light
alt: Portrait of a Toco toucan perched on a branch with soft morning light
story: Patient observation paid off with this intimate portrait.

title: Dewdrop Reflection
alt: Extreme macro of a water droplet on a leaf reflecting the forest beyond
story: Found this tiny world within a single drop at dawn.

title: Firefly Trails at Dusk
alt: Light trails from fireflies creating luminous patterns against darkening forest
story: Stacked multiple exposures to capture nature's own light show.

title: Jaguar in Pantanal Shadows
alt: Jaguar emerging from dappled forest shadows with intense gaze
story: A rare encounter in the Pantanal wetlands at golden hour.
